verses.roman:
āṅkhi mudi' prabhu preme bhūmite śayāna
nṛpati naipuṇye kare pāda-saṁvāhana

synonyms: āṅkhi mudi'-with closed eyes; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; preme—in ecstatic love; bhūmite—on the ground; śayāna—lying down; nṛpati—the King; naipuṇye—very expertly; kare—performs; pāda-saṁvāhana—massaging the legs.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was lying on the ground with His eyes closed in ecstatic love and emotion, and the King very expertly began to massage His legs.
